item.title: How to deal with trolling - the one question that breaks them: why it matters, for you?
item.description: Energy vampires, authoritarianism, trolls, propagandist and just other toxic people usually run on: Attention Validation Drama Control. I don't any of these, my goal is just peace. Especially trolls, they are not just any rude person. A troll deliberately says/does things to provoke an emotional reaction. They usually don’t believe what they’re saying — they just want attention and they can't be shamed, reasoned, satire, they know they’re being absurd.
